event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Validation & Documentation

## CONTEXT
Cycle 1 successfully implemented 100% backward API compatibility between StageOrchestrator and the legacy RDMissionController. All 51 tests passed across 5 testing phases.

## REMAINING WORK

### 1. Live Functional Test
Run an actual mission through the full stage workflow (PLANNING -> BUILDING -> TESTING -> ANALYZING -> CYCLE_END) using the modular engine to confirm no runtime errors occur in production.

### 2. Integration Verification
Verify the atlasforge_conductor.py works end-to-end by:
- Starting the dashboard (dashboard_v2.py)
- Creating a new test mission via the UI
- Observing stage transitions through at least one complete stage

### 3. Documentation Update
Create a brief API reference documenting the backward-compatible API surface in `artifacts/api_reference.md`:
- List all methods and properties
- Document parameter signatures
- Note any behavioral differences from legacy

### 4. Cleanup
- Verify test files are in appropriate locations
- Archive any temporary test scripts
- Mark mission complete if all validations pass

## SUCCESS CRITERIA
- Live mission runs without AttributeError or compatibility issues
- Dashboard shows correct stage transitions
- API documentation created

## FILES
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py (StageOrchestrator)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py (StateManager)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/atlasforge_conductor.py (consumer)
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/test_api_compatibility.py (test suite)

cycle_report.summary: Completed comprehensive API compatibility audit and fix for StageOrchestrator. The modular af_engine's StageOrchestrator class now has 100% backward API compatibility with the legacy RDMissionController. All 51 tests pass across 5 testing phases: self-tests (16), adversarial edge cases (14), integration tests (3), functional tests (11), and conductor pattern verification (7).

/home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py - Added mission_dir property, workspace path helpers
achievements: Implemented mission property setter in StageOrchestrator (line 105-108)

Implemented load_mission() method for backward compatibility (line 413-416)
Implemented load_mission_from_file() method for template loading (line 418-452)

issues: None - All implementations completed successfully and validated
